name: Galactic Frontier
overview: A galactic Empire style trading and strategy game based on older 70's games of that style, created by Blue Hills Software and published by Free Spirit Software in 1986. Exciting space exploration game for the C64. Search for life forms among the 200 billion stars in our galaxy. Scientifically accurate. Awesome graphics! For the serious students of astronomy or the casual explorer who wants to boldly go where no one has gone before.
